info.short_text: In the Department of the State Inspection of Kirov City, the road situation was reported today, 15 February.

info.short_text: In January this year, the number of injured citizens in the railway infrastructure facilities of the Civil Service decreased by more than one third.

info.title: Kiknoru ran without a rabiest dog.

info.short_text: Yesterday, the Governor of Kirov province, Alexandre Sokolov, travelled to the areas unplanned. The sand where he found out about the problems with the container sites.

info.short_text: In January 2024, Pobellovo Airport received 29,000 passengers: 6 per cent higher than last January.
info.title: Passenger traffic increased in Lubilovo in January

info.short_text: In Kirov, the delegation of the largest flour mill of the Stavropol province of the CFC AGAT.

info.title: Kirov students made cards with the city by day of all lovers.
